title: VanillaBDcraft 香草五边形材质包 【美丽，卡通，3D，有心意】
author: 雨天风
txt_content:
本帖最后由 雨天风 于 2015-7-13 09:30 编辑 
当我进入游戏的时候，总有一种想吞翔[coca_beans]的感觉，因为我已近厌倦了马赛克和2.5d的画面但是，我今天点开了一个神奇的网站：http://bdcraft.net/downloads看到了VanillaBDcraft材质包
我的心，顿时惬意了 
他仿佛大海中的灯塔，沙漠里的绿洲
让迷惘的我，找到了心仪的材质包

材质最后更新于2015年6月25日

高山流水，绿草悠悠
一切是多么美丽


它不像其他的材质包，需要高清修复补丁和光影MOD来伴随
因为，他以有接近完美的画面

它拥有卡通的一面

也有真实的一面

美丽的建筑，以为它而美丽

它有很屌的3D模型








来自官网的截图









{:10_492:}作者的话{:10_492:}

TERMS OF USEBy downloading VanillaBDcraft, you agree with the following simple, easy to understand terms of use:
VanillaBDcraft is based on PureBDcraft ResourcePack.VanillaBDcraft is a ResourcePack containing many different files, mainly textures in PNG format and 3D models in JSON format. It has been tested as much as possible but nobody is perfect and it can contains bugs. If you find one, you can report it to the VanillaBDcraft dedicated Forum.VanillaBDcraft has been scanned for viruses and malwares and do not contain any (ResourcePacks do not contain any executable files).VanillaBDcraft needs to be put in the "resourcepacks" folder of your ".minecraft" folder (generally in "%appdata%" folder for Windows).VanillaBDcraft is downloadable only if you use the official links available on this page.BDcraft reserves the right to update the Terms of Use at any time without notice to you.

By using VanillaBDcraft, you know that you ARE NOT authorized to:
modify, copy, host, mirror, publish, transfer, license, distribute, transmit, sell, monetize, reproduce, remix, alter or decompile VanillaBDcraftcreate a remixpack using one or more files from VanillaBDcraft and redistribute it

As a user of VanillaBDcraft, you know that you ARE authorized to:
decompile, alter and remix VanillaBDcraft for exclusive use in online videos if, and only if, you add due credits in video description (with a working link to BDcraft.net): "VanillaBDcraft ResourcePack by Sphax&Mickey Joe Alpha - BDcraft.net"monetize online videos using VanillaBDcraft if, and only if, you add due credits in video description (with a working link to BDcraft.net): "VanillaBDcraft ResourcePack by Sphax - BDcraft.net"copy, alter and remix textures from VanillaBDcraft for Mods Patches (read this thread for details)decompile, alter and remix VanillaBDcraft for use in non-commercial software if, and only if, you add due credits in a visible place (with a working link to BDcraft.net): "Textures/3D Models/Sounds from VanillaBDcraft ResourcePack by Sphax - BDcraft.net"

If you do not agree with one or more of above terms, do not download and/or use VanillaBDcraft.注：vanillabdcraft是resourcepack必须“安装”在你的“resourcepacks”文件夹。

这个地址和我的材质是一样的，只不过它没更新，下载也只搬了1.8的128x材质在6月25日更新，而它是于5月份编辑
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=446188&highlight=BDcraft

replies.txt_content: 虽然跟Sphax PureBDCraft名字不同，不过看起来也没有什么区别啊。
